policy_description: A basic health plan offering essential coverage for individuals
A premium health plan offering extensive coverage for families
Covers basic dental procedures such as cleanings and fillings
Vision coverage for eye exams glasses and contact lenses
Health coverage for the entire family including maternity and pediatric care
Temporary health coverage for individuals during transition periods
Coverage for prenatal and postnatal care including delivery costs
Provides coverage for accidents including hospital stays and treatments
Coverage for serious illnesses such as cancer stroke and heart disease
A life insurance policy providing a lump sum payment upon death
Covers emergency room visits urgent care and ambulance services
Provides coverage for mental health services such as therapy and counseling
Disability coverage for individuals unable to work due to illness or injury
Covers hospitalization costs including surgeries room charges and medical tests
Coverage for chronic conditions like diabetes hypertension and asthma
